ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] dateCreated with data type Point In Time
The date and time that the record of the Problem being described was originally created. Note that this property could be derived from the HealthConcernLifeCycle entries.

Contains exactly one [1..1] status with data type Code
This is the current activity status of this problem, whether active or inactive; if more detail is needed, a notation may be filed with this problem. A=Active, I=Inactive.
Contains exactly one [1..1] author, where its type is Author
Contains exactly one [1..1] dataEnterer, where its type is Data Enterer

Contains exactly one [1..1] facility, where its type is Visit Location
A pointer to Location file identifying the location at which this problem was originally observed and documented.
A pointer to Location file identifying the location at which this problem was originally observed and documented.
Contains zero or one [0..1] visit, where its type is Encounter Event

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateCreated with data type Point In Time
The date and time that the record of the Problem being described was originally created. Note that this property could be derived from the HealthConcernLifeCycle entries.

Contains exactly one [1..1] status with data type Code
This is the current activity status of this problem, whether active or inactive; if more detail is needed, a notation may be filed with this problem. A=Active, I=Inactive.
Contains exactly one [1..1] author, where its type is Author
Contains exactly one [1..1] dataEnterer, where its type is Data Enterer

Contains exactly one [1..1] facility, where its type is Visit Location
A pointer to Location file identifying the location at which this problem was originally observed and documented.
A pointer to Location file identifying the location at which this problem was originally observed and documented.
Contains zero or one [0..1] visit, where its type is Encounter Event
